alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 1:51PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Sonoma and south central Napa Counties through 230 PM PST... At 150 PM PST, the public reported a strong thunderstorm near South Santa Rosa Cdp, or near Santa Rosa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 147PM PST, the public reported pea sied hail around Santa Rosa. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Napa, Rohnert Park, Sonoma, Cotati, Roseland, South Santa Rosa Cdp, Boyes Hot Springs, Yountville, Eldridge, El Verano, Glen Ellen, Temelec, Fetters Hot Spring, Fetters Hot Springs-Agua Caliente and South Santa Rosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys
